title: 'Bigger ramifications than Venezuela': Markets brace for impact after U.S. strikes Iran
summary_full: Investors are bracing for impact after the U.S.'s attacks on Iran, a move they see as carrying far larger market consequences than the Venezuela campaign.
summary_public: Investors are bracing for impact after the U.S.'s attacks on Iran, a move they see as carrying far larger market consequences than the Venezuela campaign.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Markets brace for impact after U.S. strikes Iran
